question: Which island houses "Mount Benara"?
explanation: Mount Benara, also known as Mlima Benara, is a 660-meter high mountain peak located in Mayotte Island, an overseas region of France in the western Indian Ocean. BirdLife International identified this place as an Important Bird Area which houses several bird populations such as Comoro olive-pigeons, Mayotte drongos, and Mayotte sunbirds.
